document.full_text: protesters interrupted president barack obama at a campaign fund-raiser on thursday to complain about the treatment in detention of a u.s. soldier accused of leaking documents that appeared on the wikileaks website.
document.title: supporters of wikileaks soldier heckle obama
lines_and_colors: protesters interrupted president barack obama at a campaign fund-raiser on thursday to complain about the treatment in detention of a u.s. soldier accused of leaking documents that appeared on the wikileaks website.
